name: Delta Horizon
description: Skip the Battle Royale. Delta Horizon takes you back to basics in this team versus team third person shooter. Customize your weapons and soldier. Strategize with your team to finish the objective and secure victory. Battle in multiple game modes on arena sized maps. Fight for your rank, gain experience and you shall be rewarded.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia graphics card w/ 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
